Plot: Based on the fairy tale by The Brothers Grimm. Hansel and Gretel are trapped in the deceptively decorated house of the witch Griselda who wishes to fatten Hansel so that he may be baked ...
Title: Hansel and Gretel
Writer: Jacob Grimm (story), Wilhelm Grimm (story), Nancy Weems (screenplay), Len Talan (screenplay)
Actors: David Warner, Hugh Pollard, Nicola Stapleton, Emily Richard
